blocks.title: Detachable Block
blocks.caption: Detaches the structure it is attached to.

blocks.title: Gyro Stabilizer
blocks.caption: Stabilizing gyro that slowly rotates your vehicle towards the up direction of the block.

blocks.title: Gyro
blocks.caption: Adds rotational control and damping to your vehicle.

blocks.title: Helicopter Engine
blocks.caption: Block that can spin around quickly.

blocks.title: Large Hinge
blocks.caption: Allows a limited angle of rotation perfect for wheels.

blocks.title: Piston
blocks.caption: Extendable cylinder that moves back and forth.

blocks.title: Power Coupling
blocks.caption: A flexible electric connection between blocks.

blocks.title: Racing Hinge
blocks.caption: Allows a limited angle of rotation perfect for wheels of a fast race car.

blocks.title: Rotating Servo
blocks.caption: Block that can slowly rotate in each direction.

blocks.title: Spinning Servo
blocks.caption: Block that can spin around quickly.

blocks.title: Stackable Helicopter Engine
blocks.caption: A helicopter engine with a static top and bottom.

blocks.title: Steering Hinge
blocks.caption: Allows a limited angle of rotation perfect for wheels.

blocks.title: Straight Suspension
blocks.caption: Absorbs shock to make your vehicle drive smoother on uneven surfaces.

blocks.title: Suspension Spring
blocks.caption: Absorbs shock to make your vehicle drive smoother on uneven surfaces.

blocks.title: Trailer Hinge
blocks.caption: Ball hinge with two attachment points.

blocks.title: Dragon Jet
blocks.caption: A powerful jet engine that does not overheat.

blocks.title: Gimbal Jet
blocks.caption: A jet that always fires downwards.

blocks.title: Large Jet
blocks.caption: A big and powerful jet engine fit for an airliner.

blocks.title: Large Propeller
blocks.caption: Provides a lot of propulsive power.

blocks.title: RAW Jet
blocks.caption: A very powerful jet engine with a cooldown.

blocks.title: Rocket Engine
blocks.caption: A rocket engine with a lot of power.

blocks.title: Rocket Thruster
blocks.caption: A tiny and cheap jet engine with low thrust.

blocks.title: Space Thruster
blocks.caption: A powerful thruster fit for a spaceship.

blocks.title: Thruster
blocks.caption: A small and cheap jet engine with low thrust.

blocks.title: Armoured Seat
blocks.caption: A seat that is highly resistant to impact damage. Offers high protection from explosives

blocks.title: Crow's Nest
blocks.caption: Used to steer a ship from high up in the mast.

blocks.title: Diving Bell
blocks.caption: An underwater seat for submersible vehicles.

blocks.title: Go-kart Seat
blocks.caption: A light seat that provides very little protection.

blocks.title: Space Fighter Cockpit
blocks.caption: A slick seat for your spaceship.

blocks.title: VIP Seat
blocks.caption: A special seat for a VIP -You!

blocks.title: Drag Racing Wheel
blocks.caption: Large wheel with better grip on tarmac than rough terrain.

blocks.title: Friction Pad
blocks.caption: A pad with very high friction.

blocks.title: Go-kart Wheel
blocks.caption: Small wheel with better grip on tarmac than rough terrain.

blocks.title: Hover Block
blocks.caption: Lift engine that generates an air cushion under your vehicle.

blocks.title: Landing Wheels
blocks.caption: A pair of landing wheels to fit under an airplane.

blocks.title: Monster Truck Wheel
blocks.caption: Large and heavy wheel with good overall grip.

blocks.title: Motorcycle Wheel
blocks.caption: A rad wheel for your hog. Average grip on all surfaces.

blocks.title: Offroad Wheel
blocks.caption: Slightly better traction on rough terrain than on tarmac.

blocks.title: Racing Wheel
blocks.caption: Better grip on tarmac than rough terrain.

blocks.title: Slim Wheel
blocks.caption: Relatively poor grip and speed, but very light weight.

blocks.title: Truck Wheel
blocks.caption: Large wheel with good overall grip.
